pages.title: Night Lich
pages.text: Level: <level_t2>$(br2)Spawns in the $(bold)Lich Tower$()[$(copy:bosses_of_mass_destruction:lich_tower)bosses_of_mass_destruction:lich_tower$()].$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() using a $(key)Soul Star$().$(br2)Insert a $(key)Soul Star$() into each of the four $(key)Chiseled Stone Altars$() on the tower to summon the $(key)Night Lich$().

$(br)$(key)Night Lich$() excels at $(bold)flying$(). Prepare either $(bold)long-range attacks$() or a way to $(bold)close the gap quickly$().$(br2)Defeating $(key)Night Lich$() drops $(key)Ancient Anima$(), which can be used to craft $(boss/t1/day_night)Chaos Orbs$().
